bibl.title: The Qāḍīs of Fusṭāṭ-Miṣr under the Ṭūlūnids and the Ikhshīdids: The Judiciary and Egyptian Autonomy.
bibl.note: The Ṭūlūnids (254-292 / 868-905). - The ‘Abbāsid interregnum (292-323 / 905-935). - The Ikhshīdids (323-358 / 935-969). - Conclusion. - List of Egyptian governors and qāḍīs.

bibl.title: Journal of the American Oriental Society

bibl.seg: Mathieu Tillier, The Qāḍīs of Fusṭāṭ-Miṣr under the Ṭūlūnids and the Ikhshīdids: The Judiciary and Egyptian Autonomy.
The Ṭūlūnids (254-292 / 868-905). - The ‘Abbāsid interregnum (292-323 / 905-935). - The Ikhshīdids (323-358 / 935-969). - Conclusion. - List of Egyptian governors and qāḍīs.
